    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Satellites artificiels et naturels</string>
            <string language="en">Artificial and natural satellites</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künstliche und natürliche Satelliten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Satélites artificiais e naturais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Satelliti artificiali e naturali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τεχνητοί και φυσικοί δορυφόροι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Satélites artificiales y naturales</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre satellite  artificiel en orbite autour de la terre. La lune est le satellite naturel  de la terre.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an artificial satellite orbiting around the Earth. Moon is the Earth's natural satellite.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">satellite artificiel</string>
            <string language="en">artificial satellite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lune</string>
            <string language="en">Moon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">satellite naturel</string>
            <string language="en">natural satellite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière du soleil</string>
            <string language="en">sunlight</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt ein künstliches 
Satellitenin Umlauf bringen um die Masse. Mond ist der 
natürliche Satellit der Masse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra orbitar satellite 
artificial em torno da terra. A lua é o satélite natural da 
terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra orbitare intorno 
satellite artificiale intorno alla terra. La luna è il 
satellite naturale della terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τεχνητό δορυφόρο που 
βάζει σε τροχιά γύρω από τη γη. Το φεγγάρι είναι ο γήινος
φυσικός δορυφόρος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra moverse en órbita 
alrededor basado en los satélites artificial alrededor de la tierra. 
La luna es el satélite natural de la tierra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">künstlicher Satellit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mond</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">natürlicher Satellit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tageslicht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">satélite artificial</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">satélite natural</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">luz solar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">satellite artificiale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
